name: 洪子晏
objective:
This course is an undergraduate-level course that focuses on the theory and
application of combinatorial optimization. The course introduces well-known
combinatorial problems such as traveling salesman problem, knapsack problem, minimum spanning tree, scheduling problem, as well as the related
mathematical programming model. It also covers the techniques for solving
combinatorial problems, such as approximation algorithms and metaheuristics.
The application of the techniques will be illustrated and discussed by empirical
cases.

本課程為最佳化理論和實踐的大學程度課程。課程將介紹旅行銷售員問題、背包問題、最小生成樹、排程問題等經典組合最佳化問題及其數學模型。並概述近似演算法、啟發式演算法等求解工具，並以實務案例討論本課程方法之導入及應用。
